summary: This document is an email forwarding a letter from Senator Ben Sasse to Attorney General William Barr regarding the suicide of Jeffrey Epstein. The email requests a call to answer specific questions raised in the attached letter.

persons.name: Ben Sasse
persons.context: Author of a letter to Attorney General Barr raising specific questions about the circumstances of Jeffrey Epstein's suicide.

persons.name: William Barr
persons.context: Recipient of a letter from Senator Sasse regarding the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's suicide.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the letter; his suicide is the topic of the inquiry from Senator Sasse to Attorney General Barr.

connections.description: Senator Sasse is corresponding with Attorney General Barr, seeking answers about the Epstein suicide investigation.
Senator Sasse is inquiring about the circumstances surrounding Epstein's death.
As Attorney General, Barr oversees the Department of Justice's investigation into Epstein's suicide.

events.title: Sasse Letter to AG Barr
events.description: Senator Ben Sasse sends a letter to Attorney General William Barr raising specific questions about the suicide of Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Senator Ben Sasse sent a letter to Attorney General William Barr on August 10, 2019, regarding Jeffrey Epstein's suicide.
The email forwarding the letter requests a call to answer specific questions raised in Senator Sasse's letter.
The correspondence indicates high-level political and legal scrutiny into the circumstances surrounding Epstein's death.
